Scotland’s Minimum Unit Pricing applies pre-VAT; US historical price controls were pre-tax
Regulators monitor posted menu prices, not checkout totals
Sales tax is applied at point of sale, after base price is determined
When we analyze a “$7 ceiling,” the stadium receives only
after taxes, creating an even tighter constraint than the headline $7 suggests.
This convention matches international minimum alcohol pricing (Scotland, Wales) and US retail price regulation precedent.
